item.title: Vim Options for a beginner
item.description:
These are some options I found interesting

:set syntax on

This will trun syntac highlighting on

:set number

This will show the line number

:hardcopy > file.pdf

This will write the file to the pdf file.pdf

:set printooptions=right:20pc,left:20pc,top:20pc,bottom:20pc

This will appy margin to the print output based on the given parameters

set autoindent filetype plugin indent on

This will autoindents the code as we type
